idea-plugin.name: Smart-Commit
idea-plugin.description:
Elevate your coding workflow with our AI-Driven Commit Message Generator for all IntelliJ-based IDEs. This innovative plugin automates the often tedious task of crafting descriptive commit messages, freeing you up to focus on more critical coding tasks.
  • AI-Powered Messaging: Our tool uses advanced AI technology to generate context-specific commit messages based on your code changes.
  • Time-Saver: Automate the process of writing commit messages and save valuable time for problem-solving and coding.
  • Enhanced Readability: Our tool promotes a more efficient and readable version control history by providing concise, clear commit messages.
  • Easy Integration: Our plugin seamlessly integrates with all IntelliJ-based IDEs, offering an immediate boost to your workflow.
  • Customizable: Modify how verbose or technical your commit messages should be to align with your project's or team's style.
Whether you're a solo developer or part of a large team, our AI-Driven Commit Message Generator for IntelliJ IDEs is an essential tool to streamline your workflow and enhance version control transparency.

action.description: Change the commit message without using Git commands directly
